org.mini2Dx.ui.element

Class ImageButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.UiElement
      • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.ParentUiElement
        • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.Button
          • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.ImageButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actionable, FlexUiElement, Hoverable, NodeStateListener

    public class ImageButton
extends Button
implements NodeStateListener
    Utility implementation of Button that contains an Image
